abstract: Texas Rangers pitcher Derek Holland is preparing with team for Game 2 of American League championship series against Detroit Tigers, which was rescheduled due to rain.
snippet: After two rain delays interrupted Game 1 of the American League Championship Series on Saturday night, Major League Baseball did not take any chances Sunday.
lead_paragraph: After two rain delays interrupted Game 1 of the American League Championship Series on Saturday night, Major League Baseball did not take any chances Sunday.

headline.main: Preparation by Pitcher Is Fiction; Postponement of Game 2 of the A.L.C.S. Is Real
headline.print_headline: Preparation by Pitcher Is Fiction; Postponement of Game 2 of the A.L.C.S. Is Real
headline.seo: Game 2 of A.L.C.S. Postponed Until Monday
